gui

Class GUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • gui.GUI

  • public class GUI
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for rendering the Graphical User Interface.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GUI(Mediator mediator)
      Constructor, receives an instance of the mediator class and gets the username of the current user.

        public int addTransfer(java.lang.String source,
              java.lang.String dest,
              java.lang.String fileName,
              boolean sending)
        Add another transfer.
        Parameters:
        source - = source of the file transfer
        dest - = destionation of the file transfer
        fileName - = file to be transferred
        sending - = if the file is being downloaded/uploaded by the user we are logged in with in the application
        Returns:
        = index of transfer being initialized
